utils.thread

Class TThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • utils.thread.TThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A TThread with a task to do iterably while it's running use startThread() and stopThread()
